text: Aitana Bonmatí Conca (; ; (born 18 January 1998), is a Spanish footballer who plays as a midfielder for FC Barcelona in the Liga F and the Spain women's national team. Bonmatí has been part of Barcelona since 2012, progressing through La Masia for six years. She was promoted to Barcelona's main team before the 2016–17 season and made substitute appearances for the club until her breakout season in 2018-19. In 2019, she played in Barcelona's first-ever UEFA Women's Champions League final and was later named Catalan Player of the Year for the first time. ==Career statistics== === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup UWCL Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Barcelona 2015–16 Primera División 0 0 3 0 0 0 – 3 0 2016–17 13 2 1 1 2 0 – 16 3 2017–18 15 0 3 0 2 1 – 20 1 2018–19 27 12 3 0 7 1 – 37 13 2019–20 20 5 4 2 5 2 2 0 31 9 2020–21 31 10 2 0 9 3 1 0 43 13 2021–22 25 13 4 1 10 4 0 0 39 18 2022–23 23 10 1 2 11 5 2 2 37 19 Career total 154 52 21 6 46 16 5 2 226 76 === International === Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Spain 2017 1 0 2018 6 0 2019 12 4 2020 5 3 2021 11 7 2022 11 2 2023 8 3 Total 54 19 : Scores and results list Spain's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Bonmatí goal.
